text: BEIJING German luxury automaker Daimler will recall 2.6 million Mercedes-Benz vehicles in China due to a software design issue, the countrys market regulator said on Friday.Software may fail to communicate a vehicles correct location in the event of a crash, Chinas State Administration for Market Regulation said in a statement. Daimler declined to comment further on the recall.Last month Mercedes-Benz USA said it was recalling 1.29 million vehicles sold since 2016 for a similar reason.
